title: Support Wars....
body:
[EDIT] This is coming from a support main.

How Supports see it...
http://imgur.com/sQd2sf5

How we see it...
http://imgur.com/jOPVMNz

replies.body:
SUPPORTAL COMBAT
Braum vs Thresh
FIGHT

_After hours of fighting, blow after blow, Thresh seems to be gaining the upper hand... But then, in a last ditch effort, Braum whistles into the air. Thresh laughs, this is but another soul to collect. But as he raises his hook, he stops. The ground rumbles ever so slightly, but shakes more and more until out from the jungle...
A herd of poros, stampeding towards him. He lets out a strangled cry, but it is too late. They are already upon him. He is trampled under the paws of hundreds, no thousand, or poros, who heeded the call of Braum, the Great Poro Friend. Braum lets out a soft laugh as he begins his recall as his whispers to his opponent...
Flufftality_

I want a braum skin where his ult is replaced with a wave of poros.

MAKE IT HAPPEN RITO.
#BattleHerdBraum
#support
I support this ;)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TLj1TrKhhQo
Really diggin the Kill La Kill OST in the background.
I did get the poro wave inspiration from that to a certain extent xD
so we need a poroKing braum skin? im game for that.....
Super fighting supporter, POROMAN!!!

and the graves that was farming mere feet away during the whole fight fires an explosive round into the pack killing braum and a great deal of his poro friends. braum was reported that game for feeding.
LOL. I did want to add that a Jinx ult hits Braum last second but for some reason I couldn't get out of the italics.
_Pay your respects_
^this, should be an animated short.

SUPPORTAL COMBAT
Round 2: Tahm Kench Vs Blitzcrank
FIGHT

_As the two adversaries march on each other, robot and river demon, Tahm Kench straightens his collars and tips his hat. Blitzcrank lets out a hiss of steam as he sets his coolant to full power. Tahm attempts to initiate the fight with his tongue, extending it out and whipping Blitzcrank across the chest. It bounces off harmlessly. Blitzcrank fires his hand, grabbing Tahm Kench by the front of his overcoat and dragging him in. They fight each other for hours, Tahm continually body-slamming and whipping to no avail, and Blitzcrank punching madly, attempting to find weak points in Tahm's thick skin. Tahm grows tired, but Blitzcrank cannot feel exhaustion. Blitzcrank punches Tahm in the stomach with incredible force, activating his gag reflex and throwing him to the ground. A helmet, covered in blood and digestive juices, bounces high in the air and lands on Blitzcrank's front, the powerful stomach acids tearing a hole through Blitz's reinforced armour. Tahm, in a final strain, bites through Blitzcrank, tearing off his right arm. Tahm, mustering all his energy, throws Blitzcrank into his mouth and swallows him. He pulls a simple hourglass out of his coat pocket, and breaks it, pouring sand of pure gold onto his head. There is a brilliant flash of warm light, and then Tahm falls over, defeated. His mouth opens slightly, and small shards of metal, along with various bolts and wires, fall on the ground in front of him. Completely spent, he lies there, reflecting on the battle. He closes his eyes and summons up magical power that teleports him back to his base. The River King lives to fight another day._
But Thresh helped save those poros from Baron Nashor...

And then there's Tahm Kench support
 https://media3.giphy.com/media/NOalcASHiOGvC/200.gif
SUPPORTAL COMMMMBAT

Being a support is serious business. In my dojo, you will learn how to stop a 5-man gank, ward more than the entire team combined WITHOUT buying a Sightstone, hit like a truck with only a feather, and carry your team to victory, whether they want it or not. You will be a dreaded presence to the enemy, intolerable yet implacable as the mountains. Others may consider us clowns, but we make the magic of Pentakills happen. We save our allies from doom on a regular basis, and we light the way and support the team on a shoestring budget.

Do NOT underestimate us.
Sometimes we feel the need to be a little more active in the carrying. That's when we bring out the primary Mages! xD
And yet without us you wouldnt have 3/4 of your kills on your account. Thank you supports.

> [{quoted}](name=J Wilson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YevqfGh9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-07T23:57:55.896+0000)
>
> And yet without us you wouldnt have 3/4 of your kills on your account. Thank you supports.

lol need more people like you 

my first year i was a bot lane main my second year i was a top/jungle main and that is the reason i made the swap. the bot with the better supp always won and it made adc impossible when my supp would sit in push and fap. legit 100% cancer becuase they always threw the laneing under the bus went mid who was wining and thought it was me where any intelligent person knew it was a 2v2 to a 2v1 where the lane was already won.... supp would be brain dead if they didnt start doing well mid in a 2v1 some times 3v1 or 3v2 while i was fucked 1v2ing a fed bot most of the time.

actually did better 1v2 since i was forced to farm under turret was luci vs vayne leo one game and runied them for 20 mins tell my supp came back from a dc at that point i had them by the balls the late supp didnt matter and was only possible becuase of the dc
you nowhere near capture the awesomeness of braum's fighting.

> [{quoted}](name=Final Boss Naut,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YevqfGh9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-07T23:58:17.822+0000)
>
> you nowhere near capture the awesomeness of braum's fighting.

Not gonna lie, as a Braum main i think of this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ef9bwo4zP9Y when im supporting.

And this when im top lane fighter https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aEA-5rfjRhE

And this just in general http://i.imgur.com/tOYSGe9.gif

As a support main I am offended by this

I have 1v2 as a support and got a double kill while my adc rage quit because I "took" a kill from a dot effect... I was morgana

I proceeded to with the 2v1 but late game we didn't have push and adventually we lost

This was a plat vs silver and I was a silver, they were plat, so I wasn't playing vs bads

Good supports can do all the work while adc passively farm, I've gotten both my enemy lakers down to 20% hp as Janna before my adc touched them

Supports can be dangerouse early game, and vital in keeping your carries alive late game
downvoted for taking a meme seriously.

Racist jokes can be offensive. Do you defend those as well when you know 20% of your audience is that race? (Basing this off of 1/5 roles played in an average game is support)
downvoted for taking out of context. support isn't a race. its a conscious choice.
downvoted for oppressing supports and not taking them seriously
downvoted for not checking my main.
downvoted for having a smurf

which means a main account
so that implies you also have a smurf

with as many hours as i have logged, this is definitely my only account.
then why didn't you say to just lolking you
cause i get called a smurf alot because i have so much ip i change my name regularly for lolz.

I play nid support people think im trolling until i get a 5 min double kill and end with more ap than the enemy mid laner

I carry the adc not the other way around
That's not playing support then, that's literally just playing mage bottom.

so you're telling me a {{champion:201}} vs {{champion:89}} fight isn't the most ridiculous thing you've ever seen? nobody asked you about your morgana double kills or your muhkanix. If you got 2 laner down to %20 as janna then they were just trash btw.

> [{quoted}](name=darkmatchwaldo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YevqfGh9,comment-id=00060004,timestamp=2015-10-08T13:11:18.466+0000)
>
> so you're telling me a {{champion:201}} vs {{champion:89}} fight isn't the most ridiculous thing you've ever seen? nobody asked you about your morgana double kills or your muhkanix. If you got 2 laner down to %20 as janna then they were just trash btw.

It was a Leona, ez and they weren't bad, I was running a heavy mana regen at the time, so every Leona engage got Q stopped, the. Shield myself and AA her, adventually she was to low to engage and stayed back, then I went ahead and started harassing their adc and after I got the adc low as well I purposely put myself out of position to be jumped on by Leona and my adc came in and cleaned house (I had a trist)

I nullified any of their damage with shields due to excessive mana regen, but now with my ping going from ~30 to ~90 it's a bit harder to do that :(. Glad other people went from 400-500 to 100 ping but I miss my near no lag. Lol

okay that's actually pretty funny.

mine went from like 170 down to 50 :D
You obviously haven't seen a good support with an AFK ADC sell their support item and go full ham. I had to do that one game and we won 4v5.

But if you really wanted to safeguard against a situation like that you would just pick "support" {{champion:99}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:1}}
That's why champs like those are popular in solo q. If you get an afk or garbage ADC, you can take over.
Seeing {{champion:37}} and {{champion:267}} fight 1v1 is so adorable!
